feed.title: Lidarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.5.3.4341
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • 1dee2aaf808d65021750e6c0baff89245fd597a8 Fix tests
  • f024dad65f6288c66ff98b28f07bd086a7e29097 Bump workflow actions
  • ef3b644d52a81f92666e7bddf6b61d35fb19b8a2 Fixed: Update English Localization reference to Movies (#5061)
  • af4eeeb8931f1148d10254507a6eea86da754ba7 Don't persist value for SslCertHash when checking for existence
  • 7738ee78c81ad68cb8d5ed8b34945e065269fc61 Automated API Docs update
  • 8d3dc0a470707fd6df0d7d18bd55cc0ef690b641 Validation for bulk series editor [ #4983 ]
  • 2b8b8ed147c76d6fa1b5078d4ca0f3712824369e New: Configurable log file size limit [ #4982 ]
  • 828e04bcadf474614739207e8f7876e8035d28c9 New: Add Compact Log Event Format option for console logging [ #4981 ]
  • bb6528c104ecb722e85b8f5f74d8f64dd6a967aa Upgrade nlog to 5.3.3 [ #4980 ]
  • f49388f3c4e78f776a729285050e4c46c79735ff Fixed: Ensure Root Folder exists when Adding Artist [ #5041 ]
See More * 8ff8c27e24113b178ab65386d847d66260e51b1e New: Root folder exists validation for import lists [ #4820 ] * 281bcb28fe967bb240310b0334edd97d8c2e3d5b New: Configure log file size limit in UI [ #5023 ] * e60a21967112ddc5cb22ff7ee953639b6f722f1b Bump babel packages [ #5025 ] * 34ac9dbfcbe2580cc0bbf43d15973789151808fa Use autoprefixer in UI build [ #5024 ] * 30ceb776159e4cb07ba197d2cdb774b03f8fd053 New: Bulk manage custom formats [ #5050 ] * 304646f324234ecbecfc8fcef36daed5c9db2291 Fixed: Hide reboot and shutdown UI buttons on docker [ #5048 ] * 75551419619f0329bd1125b9185b80c69dad2a39 Fixed: Trim spaces and empty values in Proxy Bypass List [ #5044, #5045 ] * df09e903d4c7aeed21986725da8a39d28fe13043 New: Bypass IP addresses ranges in proxies * 88f4c0c6cd65d5129fe12a7e66821239d018a407 Fix disabled style for monitor toggle button * 8f9281f91438e5e04211a273a78c7597a6964b85 Updated code action fixall value for VSCode * Revert "Fixed: Stale formats score after changing quality profile for artists" * 6673d14eddcb4e9f6e2cd47890dd62ec89651b14 Fixed: Duplicated changelog lines * da954dc31e6ddbb934b271db533c8605c0b5a33a Align queue action buttons on right [ #4989 ] * 51d22bed2a19fc244d3f3320d34305f731e149e9 Include available version in update health check [ #4949, #5000 ] * 04e0d3f22e9cb9aedd19c2c8a4602f686388898b Skip duplicate import list exclusions [ #5003 ] * 809db4022e062211091afe0cffa8469b246d2aa2 Fixed: Persist selected custom filter for interactive searches [ #5006 ] * afbead8a88efbf150ac427f15c5522efa7bc5d7f Fixed: Stale formats score after changing quality profile for artists [ #5009 ] * 950e94564e2e89a40cb286e4abcf26414a222a4b Sort quality and metadata profiles by name in custom filters [ #5010 ] * 790e1233ec2468916fc50c7c4b7df577c4a5fa97 Bump version to 2.5.2 * b259136d3f2bce6f1d8492b59805744373f5aa13 Add indexes for albums statistics * 54607eb2e07bc7b66db32354313d36e7b47643be Cache root folders for artist paths * 07b3ebb1aa73fecbaeb9633a7ebeba964d625b70 Fix typos and improve log messages * 1ec1fc4c67e55705c386159513d7be98887f5d61 Fixed: Overwriting query params for remove item handler (#7075) * 36e67fdc2e6c91c9cc28f2a87774a27b9eb0b6d1 Fixed: Removing invalid statuses on provider deletion * 916fbb2a69e908fdb648d4c30d2503645c458132 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 4904e52c95946cb4d5c1d89fde76d0351b099d3f Don't hash files in development builds * 49f452a958db8e1f198329da21b289662fe0d1de Fixed: Interactive Import dropdown width on mobile * 6ef3a0a6d40fcf226eae2ec96e0b6592e54f75d8 New: Return downloading magnets from Transmission * 683f690a859b92e2d9eab5fc1a99f0b1ef441cb4 New: Default file log level changed to debug * 0216f46b378713b6c6d999715946413f6e65b561 Fixed: Moving files for torrents when Remove Completed is disabled * d2bd9b48492ee240253f31e4acf6fc4c966d31ec Improve messaging for renamed track files progress info * 70e524409c7a7e825f024b097e5235f047264bd7 Bump ImageSharp to 3.1.5 * 3a3c19fb7706029faf9c1ac76d7ad1054aaf8437 Treat forcedMetaDL from qBit as queued instead of downloading * c6362cb47a732fbb22c4367156d180305038f2d8 New: Ignore Litestream tables in Database * cb7e3987a9ecf699d8a91201a3b05b4d3db6bab3 Bump version to 2.5.1 * 328d089d929b42991f81de9a58881ca591cc84c2 New: Bump dotnet to 6.0.32 * ffa21676530e37d12d195a930a2494ce75e81dcd Fixed: Selecting a root folder in add new artist modal * e2e4a94a9f6db23d1e17054c04f9a38f18a54d26 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * fb75b28cb18b4a00db7fbd5fdae2266ac999cc30 New: Show update settings on all platforms [ #4919 ] * 7f73a2e23aa57696c0fb11cd05e6e8badfd21bd6 New: Use natural sorting for lists of items in the UI [ #4912, #4921 ] * a9dd947eedaac750c451b3fab79951d8f38e659e Remove extraneous indentation in RemoveFileExtension * d845d73130df4b7e5a16a7ecae6ce9ce594d5978 Fixed: Assume category path from qBittorent starting with '//' is a Windows UNC path [ adarr/Radarr#10162 ] * 2328611472a341c2e339f43907d9cdcc2c2b0176 New: Wrap specifications in Custom Format and Auto Tagging modals * 95609913270e0b8678be5c848292d03a2f2e03e8 Fixed: Removing pending release without blocklisting [ #4892 ] * ed07f82218dcde4b4b20db4fc3a4bfc01be29c60 Fixed: Linking Next/Last albums for bulk edit artists * 633feaa02342b646277557610e78133c7eb1aeaf Fixed disable options for SelectInput * 56679861a01232a5881a81d0a7593c452452b04f Mapping `ArtistMetadataId` is needed for last/next monitored albums * a52c6f6f41bff9b76a34085aca01a1a709bdf62d Fixed: Display last/next monitored albums for artists * eb04673040e9a320c038f7c5be798b34cba7d1d4 New: Include with files in album group info * 30e681e84336a1656ab66586cd82a21c8b340465 Fixed: Refactor artist statistics * 19f824dbd8bce56ba91a96800ef1dd54a5fcc098 Bump version to 2.5.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Lidarr/43582661-9ac3-4ec6-9583-209885d5ff34/_release?releaseId=97&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.6.4.4402
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • 0e9a5fbd04a605ff1d639c32ba3936b1cc1a3fdc Automated API Docs update
  • f3cd49a2dadd4028f0643e5e3e5082efea2277f8 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 1a74118d6bf4264ee81455872fd46adcec589ce4 New: Use 307 redirect for requests missing URL Base
  • 9850823298ea49fa2373ef0917cde43121a3ff6f Fixed: Error updating providers with ID missing from JSON
  • bd7d25f963b27153655bf5ea1258e02c78bc440e Fixed: Sorting by title and release dates in Select Album modal [ #5145, #5125 ]
  • 3a5012655e94d5cc927c3be3dd82ee0661c50325 Bump macOS runner version to 13
  • ba55a4778aa86e66cf94ade8280ffcaa71b20729 Bump version to 2.6.4
  • ff91589f735ecf093dd201202b5fcbf0af3d4c52 Automated API Docs update
  • 2caba01123d7585817c32b190365d2f85d7e8366 Fix tests for nested artist folders
  • 4588bc4a7e9809cfa735068128020a6e19588a6d Fixed: Manual importing to nested artist folders

'_temp*' (#5142) * 715274bcc7d489346faafc4cbb89d64a1151bffe Improve indexer name for RED * 9b063aa291a698b6f1eed620ba9ad27cb8e2159b Bump version to 2.6.3 * af4ff004768800440de3c06af8aa7bd2b1f4cdcd Fixed: Telegram log message including token * b14c647c86b3276ee44b82309f227d4328559572 Display naming example errors when all fields are empty * 00cca22dc7957a6475331836e6e0f31ae6616b50 Fixed: Adding individual albums for existing artists * 73fddd5201c6bf7e8663a950800debc91040c2f3 Update license reference * b7e5a745a1e4e9279a302f4bac7176d3af1a7376 Bump version to 2.6.2 * b67533bccff38bed0a138a55e10732ce9750193b Automated API Docs update * 21d9ecccd6a409fad8881fe81d75f9e5f1ddd100 Fixed: Improve validation for individual album adding * New: Check for available space before grabbing [ #5095 ] * 856ac2ffa5344b9d2fb0f54a12abf935b8bad9ca New: Add exception to SSL Certificate validation message [ #5103 ] * b2a4c75cce80ad763d691d04bd8d47b0e59ab753 Fixed: Refresh tags after updating autotags [ #5093 ] * 2818f4e0732edeef63cd271875a88e663194fbef New: Use instance name in forms authentication cookie name [ #5102 ] * 60fe75877b7d0e5b554a9957a64117c934788443 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 2170ada8a2db9595834c559abb97cc574c823892 Fixed: Linking autotags with tag specification to all tags * entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.7.1.4417
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • cb6608975e3778d4e753592a11edd9232bea1e59 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.8.2.4493
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.9.6.4552
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.
